ARABIC: وَقَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱئْتُونِى بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Pharaoh said, 'Bring me every knowledgeable magician.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Bring the cleverest magicians to me," said the Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And Pharaoh said (to his) men: 'Bring every skilled sorcerer to me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh ordered every skillful magician to come into his presence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Firaun said, “Bring every expert magician to me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Fir`awn said: "Bring me every well-versed sorcerer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Firon said: Bring to me every skillful magician.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Pharaoh said, 'Bring me every cunning sorcerer.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Pharaoh said: Bring every cunning wizard unto me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then Pharaoh said, "Bring me every skilled magician!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Firawn said: bring unto me every magician knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Pharaoh said, ‘Bring me every expert magician.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Said Pharaoh: "Bring me every sorcerer well versed."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said: "Bring to me every well-versed sorcerer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Pharaoh said, “Bring me every experienced sorcerer.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Pharaoh said, "Bring to me every learned magician."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:79]   And Pharaoh said, ‘Bring me every cunning sorcerer’, [every] individual excelling in the art of sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Pharaoh said: Bring every cunning) every skilful (wizard unto me).
